title: Why does Riot think you're toxic & deserved to be punished?
body:
I'm just getting real tired of seeing repeated threads of punished people going all "WHY DAFUQ AM I BAN FOR?" when all the answers can be found just right in their chat logs. So in this thread, Imma lay it out for you fast & simple on why you're considered to be toxic.

#1) Asking others to report someone

This is useless.

Having 9 people to report this one troller/afk/etc equals to 1 report itself, so asking others to report the guy does not help in anything at all. Making a report on someone is literally flagging the guy, just to make sure Riot to take notice of him. And no, making more than the 1 report will not add more flags on him.

Asking others to report this one individual is considered to be toxic because, taking in account from the previous statement, it is nothing more than asking others to point more fingers on him. Like, how is that of any help?

#2) gg ez

I don't care what you think it is, about being only 4 simple letters & all, this is still, and will always, be considered toxic as well. This is basically the short version of "Good game man, btw, you sucked hard". 

"GG" is acceptable since this is like a text version of two sportsman handshaking.
"GG WP" is showing respect to your opponents when both sides tried their very best.
"GG EZ" is nothing more than spitting on your opponent's face just for the fun of it.

#3) whining constantly about a teammates' mistakes/picks/etc.

I'm talking about one of those chats which goes like:

blitz wtf
why dont yall help
lol wow blitz and mord

FUC U KAT I SWEAR
fizz shut up man u fed bot and now we losing
kat ur really gettin reported
KAT STOP GOING IN!

im so donme
fizz ur really bad
nah ur doing bad
JUST FF OMG
U GUYS SUCK
THIS TEAMS TOTAL TRASH
no
ur makin me even more mad renket
OMG!
stfu
man u dont he;lp u fed in 5 mins of the game
limke ur really bad

I'd rather you give out useful advice to them instead of bashing them with harsh words like it's helping. Even if that doesn't help, use an early Back ping with your G button for an easy signal. You'll gain nothing from constantly talking down like that at them, plus with your so-called "im done" phrase. Like, did you really mean that?

---------

Whenever I ever come again to yet another permaban threads or the likes in the future(which is most likely), I'll just copy paste this thread's URL to save the trouble. Feel free to take this thread for yourself too if you like, otherwise, update it as much as possible.
